content.raw:
That message is nice too, but some other command line tools are also printing more human-readable details, i.e.:

~~~
$ ign fuel download -v 4 -u 'https://fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/1.0/chapulina/models/Beer'
Downloading model: 
  Name: Beer
  Owner: chapulina
  Server:
    URL: https://fuel.ignitionrobotics.org
    Version: 1.0

[Msg] Downloading model [https://fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/chapulina/models/Beer]
Download succeeded.
~~~
content.html:
That message is nice too, but some other command line tools are also printing more human-readable details, i.e.:

$ ign fuel download -v 4 -u 'https://fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/1.0/chapulina/models/Beer'
Downloading model: 
  Name: Beer
  Owner: chapulina
  Server:
    URL: https://fuel.ignitionrobotics.org
    Version: 1.0

[Msg] Downloading model [https://fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/chapulina/models/Beer]
Download succeeded.
